attributes.action: Make baby formula easily affordable for all UK families
attributes.additional_details: For the health and well-being of all babies in the UK. It shouldn’t be an item people simply can not afford.
attributes.background: People are stealing baby formula in the UK due to the rising prices. We want the government to make baby formula easily affordable/available for all UK babies.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of formula milk are a matter for manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

In certain cases a GP might prescribe an appropriate infant formula. Decisions about when to make a prescription for infant formula are a clinical matter for individual clinicians.

You can find out more about when a GP might prescribe infant formula here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/baby/breastfeeding-and-bottle-feeding/bottle-feeding/types-of-formula/
